channel.title: Music – Kris Allen

item.title: Kris Allen - Better With You
item.description:
작곡: Kris Allen, Jason Ree… / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 79663 / KY: 22658

Wherever I go
whatever I do
Stay
by my side
Cuz baby it’s always
better with you
In the middle
of the pouring rain
On a crowded
subway train
When I’m just
about to go insane
You make it
go away
Monday morning
in a traffic jam
And I’m going
to be late again
The world is getting
underneath my skin
I see you
smiling
And know that
it’s going to be okay
Wherever I go
whatever I do
Stay
by my side
Cuz baby it’s always
better with you
Girl when I’m alone
you’re where I belong
Cuz baby it’s always
better with you oh oh
Baby it’s always
better with you
You make a bad day
better than good
You make me feel
better than I should
You understand
when I’m misunderstood
Like no one
else ever could
Girl
you show me things
I never see
if you were never
There to see them
with me
And when I get
a little too crazy
You are
my sanity
And everything will
be okay
Wherever I go
whatever I do
Stay
by my side
Cuz baby it’s always
better with you
Girl when I’m alone
you’re where I belong
Cuz baby it’s always
better with you oh oh
Baby it’s always
better with you
Girl it doesn’t matter
where we go
Cuz you always make it
feel like it’s home
When I’m with you
oh oh oh
Wherever I go
whatever I do
Stay
by my side
Cuz baby it’s always
better with you
Girl when I’m alone
you’re where I belong
Cuz baby it’s always
better with you oh oh
Baby it’s always
better with you oh oh
Baby
it’s always better
It’s always better
with you
